text: "All Night Long" is a 1980 song by British band Rainbow and was taken from their fourth studio album Down to Earth. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in Ireland and number 110 in the United States. ==Track listings== 7" UK: # "All Night Long" – 3:50 # "Weiss Heim" – 5:07 7" US: # "All Night Long" – 3:49 # "Danger Zone" – 4:30 7" Netherlands: # "All Night Long" – 3:49 # "No Time To Lose" – 3:41 ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal Category:Rainbow (rock band) songs
title: All Night Long (Rainbow song)
